thread.title: Trump FIRED Michael Flynn over Russia lie
thread.title_full: Trump FIRED Michael Flynn over Russia lie

title: Trump FIRED Michael Flynn over Russia lie
text: White House secrets and lies crisis explodes: Trump FIRED his national security adviser over 'eroding level of trust' - but Mike Pence was kept in dark for days even AFTER FBI quizzed Flynn National Security Advisor Michael Flynn stepped down on Monday night after President Trump demanded his ouster The president sought the senior aide's resignation and received it, Press Secretary Sean Spicer said Tuesday, because of an 'eroding level of trust' House Speaker Paul Ryan says Trump was right to get rid of his top national security aide - he was the first to say that Flynn had been sacked Resignation comes on heels of a report that Justice Department warned the Trump administration last month about Flynn's contacts with Russia Said he was vulnerable to blackmail for saying to the vice president and others that he did not talk to Russia about the lifting sanctions Flynn last week backpedaled and said they may have come up - Trump determined as a result that he could not 'trust' him FBi investigated and interviewed Flynn shortly after he took office - if he did not tell them the truth, he faces felony charges Ex-general was paid to party with Putin in Moscow in 2015 Published: 16:49 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 05:18 GMT, 15 February 2017 166 shares
